name: Just Shoot Things
description:
A simple infinite endurance challenge to test your bullet dodging skills.

COMING SOON:

  • More guns that go pew pew
  • More enemies
  • Power-ups
  • Increasing difficulty
  • Alternate controls for left-handers

For all licences and attributions please consult the ATTRIBUTIONS.txt document in the file provided.

Press H to hide the crosshair if you find it distracting.

CONTROLS:

Standard WASD movement.

Left-Mouse to shoot.

Esc to pause.

If you have any suggestions or encounter any bugs please share them in the comments. If you have a bug to report, detailed steps for reproducing the error would be helpful.

If you enjoy playing, please rate the game and provide feedback! It's always appreciated.

Have fun!
